A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a family of Star Wars fans\, I must say the movie stunk.! I realize they are shooting for a younger market and a female market. But they missed the mark. My 12 yr old fan girl left saying she will not go to the movies and watch another new Star Wars film. She said there was too many jokes. And not enough suspense to the plot line to keep you wondering what will happen next. I went because I wanted to see Luke. I wanted to find out who Rey was. And then just killed the whole movie. What a waste..
